project.title: Development of Efficient Mask R-CNN for Mines-Like Object Detection and Segmentation
project.overview: Addressed maritime mine detection using sonar imaging by designing an efficient instance segmentation pipeline.
key_innovations: Robust Object Detection using a modified Mask R-CNN architecture with RoIAlign, Feature Pyramid Networks, and a ResNet50 backbone.
Synthetic Data Generation using denoising diffusion probabilistic models (DDPM) to augment sonar imagery and mitigate data scarcity.
Comparative Analysis employing metrics like mAP and recall to evaluate the impact of synthetic data on detection performance.

projects.title: EV Charging Optimization Using Context-Aware LSTM
projects.challenge: Overcome limitations of conventional charging strategies that rely solely on instantaneous state-of-charge and battery temperature.
projects.solution: Developed a predictive framework incorporating an LSTM network enhanced with an attention encoding mechanism, leveraging contextual inputs (battery SoC, ambient conditions, and user-defined goals) to generate optimal charging profiles.

projects.title: Optimizing Test Bench Procedures with Machine Learning
projects.challenge: Enhance traditional test bench processes to predict potential field failures and improve system performance.
projects.solution: Integrated tree-based models (Random Forest, Gradient Boosting, Decision Trees) with large-scale data processing in Databricks, and implemented SHAP for model interpretability to identify high-impact warranty issues.
projects.impact: Identified warranty issues valued at €20 million and reduced overall warranty costs by approximately 10%.

projects.title: MLOps Infrastructure for Fleet-Level Energy Efficiency
projects.challenge: Monitor and optimize energy efficiency across a fleet of over 300,000 PHEV vehicles while ensuring compliance with emissions standards.
projects.solution: Built an end-to-end MLOps ecosystem using Databricks and MLflow for experiment tracking, coupled with Azure Kubernetes Service for scalable model deployment, automated data pipelines, and retraining triggers.
projects.impact: Enabled robust compliance monitoring and optimized resource utilization, directly supporting regulatory requirements.

projects.title: RAG-Based LLM Application for Regulatory & Legal Information Retrieval
projects.challenge: Streamline the retrieval and synthesis of complex regulatory and legal documentation.
projects.solution: Developed a retrieval-augmented generation system that combines a fine-tuned large language model with a vector store for dense document embeddings, employing hybrid retrieval methods and custom prompt engineering.
projects.impact: Enhanced operational efficiency and regulatory compliance by reducing research time and providing clear, actionable insights.

projects.title: NLP Data Science Internship
projects.overview: Worked on a comprehensive NLP project to enhance chatbot capabilities by analyzing Indonesian language customer support and social media data.
projects.data_extraction: Utilized BigQuery to extract conversation logs and social media data, implementing complex SQL queries and data sampling strategies to ensure representative datasets.
projects.exploratory_data_analysis: Conducted statistical and visual analyses of conversation patterns, message lengths, and frequency of key phrases.
projects.nlp_labeling: Implemented weak supervision frameworks (e.g., Snorkel) and clustering techniques (K-means, embedding-based clustering) to label Indonesian utterances for intent recognition.
projects.model_exploration: Explored classical NLP techniques (NLTK, SpaCy) and transformer-based models (BERT, RoBERTa) alongside sequence models (LSTMs, GRUs) to improve intent detection.
projects.deployment: Tracked experiments using MLflow, integrated with Gojek’s in-house tool Merlin, and deployed interactive dashboards with Streamlit for performance monitoring.

projects.title: Aeronautical Data Management and Digital Mapping
projects.overview: Managed and compiled critical aerodrome data from global Aeronautical Information Publications (AIPs) to support aviation safety and operational efficiency.

aeronautical_data_management.AIP_analysis: Extracted and verified detailed data from AIPs, interpreted specialized aviation notations, and maintained up-to-date records in a complex, multi-source environment.
aeronautical_data_management.static_dynamic_integration: Categorized static elements (runway dimensions, taxiway configurations) and tracked dynamic changes (NOTAMs, seasonal updates).
aeronautical_data_management.database_management: Designed and maintained a database of approximately 28,000 aerodromes with optimized schemas and indexing strategies for efficient retrieval.

projects.digital_mapping: Developed digital airport maps using satellite imagery and geospatial analysis, ensuring adherence to ICAO standards and high positional accuracy.
projects.process_automation: Automated repetitive data extraction and validation processes, achieving a consistent 15% quarter-over-quarter improvement in operational efficiency.

patent.title: Electric Vehicle Charging Score Generation using Field Cars and Endurance Cars with Car Specific Embedding and LSTM
patent.overview: A novel, data-driven approach for optimizing EV charging by generating a dynamic charging score based on vehicle-specific data and sequential modeling.

technical_competencies.time_series_analysis: Utilizes LSTM networks to handle sequential EV charging data, incorporating gating mechanisms and backpropagation through time (BPTT).
technical_competencies.feature_engineering: Implements car-specific embedding to transform raw vehicle attributes into dense vector representations.
technical_competencies.data_management: Integrates data from Field Cars and Endurance Cars with robust data acquisition, cleaning, and storage techniques.
technical_competencies.model_training: Employs appropriate loss functions, cross-validation, and performance metrics to train and evaluate the predictive model.
technical_competencies.domain_expertise: Demonstrates in-depth knowledge of EV battery technology, charging principles, and factors influencing charging behavior.

strengths: Novel combination of car-specific embeddings and LSTM
Practical applicability in optimizing EV charging efficiency
Scalability to large datasets and real-time predictions
considerations: Ensuring data privacy and compliance with regulations (GDPR, CCPA)
Improving model explainability using techniques like SHAP or LIME
Meeting real-time performance requirements for on-device deployment
Handling data variance between Field Cars and Endurance Cars

summary: Mahendra Gehlot is a highly skilled data scientist with advanced expertise in machine learning, deep learning, time series analysis, and large-scale data processing. His academic background, extensive professional experience, and robust certification record have equipped him with the ability to design, develop, and deploy innovative data-driven solutions across automotive research, NLP-driven customer engagement, and aeronautical data management. His patented work in EV charging optimization further underscores his innovative approach and domain expertise in electric vehicle technology.
